item.title: 航天器和火箭公司 Firefly Aerospace 申请 IPO
item.description: 萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）是一家总部位于得克萨斯州的初创企业，今年早些时候，该公司的一艘机器人飞船在月球上着陆。【原文：Firefly Aerospace, the Texas-based startup that landed a robotic spacecraft on the moon earlier this year, filed for an initial public offering with the U.S Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会批准 T-Mobile 44 亿美元收购 US Cellular
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会批准 T-Mobile US 公司收购 US Cellular 公司的大部分无线业务及其部分网络基础设施。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission cleared T-Mobile US Inc. to acquire much of the wireless business of US Cellular Corp and some of its network infrastructure.】

item.title: 埃尔-查波之子对美国贩毒指控认罪
item.description: 锡那罗亚贩毒集团头目华金-埃尔-查波-古斯曼-洛埃拉（Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman Loera）的儿子周五承认了联邦贩毒指控，并同意与美国检察官合作，指证其他被告。【原文：A son of Sinaloa drug cartel kingpin Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman Loera pleaded guilty Friday to federal drug-trafficking charges and agreed to cooperate with US prosecutors by testifying against other defendants.】

item.title: 关税带来通胀风险，美元创二月以来最佳一周表现
item.description: 美元创下四个多月来的最佳单周表现，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统最新的关税威胁加剧了人们对贸易紧张局势升级将刺激通胀并破坏风险市场反弹的担忧。【原文：The dollar turned in its best weekly performance in more than four months as President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats heightened concern that escalating trade tensions will stoke inflation and derail a rally in risk markets.】

item.title: 久经沙场的华尔街牛市证明很难被吓倒
item.description: 华尔街对震荡的容忍度正变得越来越高。【原文：Wall Street’s tolerance for shock is becoming heroic.】

item.title: 美欧贸易协定取决于汽车、农业和特朗普
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着欧盟和美国在未来几天内努力达成临时贸易协议，汽车和农业关税水平已成为双方之间的关键症结所在。【原文：Cars and tariff levels on agriculture have emerged as key sticking points between the European Union and the US as the two sides work toward a provisional trade agreement in the coming days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: NIQ Global 最快将于下周在美国上市，市值超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，NIQ Global Intelligence Plc 公司准备最快于下周初正式开始首次公开募股的市场推广工作，从而引领夏季中期美国上市潮。【原文：NIQ Global Intelligence Plc is poised to formally begin marketing its initial public offering as soon as early next week, according to people familiar with the matter, leading a wave of mid-summer US listings.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，马斯克的 xAI 公司在新一轮融资中寻求 2000 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能和社交媒体公司XAI控股公司（XAI Holdings）正处于一轮融资的早期阶段，该轮融资可能使该公司的估值达到2000亿美元。【原文：XAI Holdings, Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence and social media company, is in the early stages of a funding round that could value the business at $200 billion, according to a report in the Financial Times.】

item.title: Codelco 铜矿复苏步入正轨，上半年产量增长 9
item.description: Codelco 公司上半年的产量比去年同期增长了 9%，表明这家全球最大的铜供应商的复苏工作已步入正轨。【原文：Codelco posted a 9% production increase in the first half compared with a year earlier, signaling that the world’s biggest copper supplier is on track in its recovery efforts.】

item.title: 穆迪称特朗普的贸易战有利于民间信贷
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）私人信贷全球主管马克-平托（Marc Pinto）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策预计将鼓励企业将业务转移到美国，并减少对全球供应链的依赖，这为私人信贷带来了引人注目的机遇。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff policies, which are expected to encourage companies to shift operations to the US and reduce dependence on global supply chains, present a compelling opportunity for private credit, according to Marc Pinto, global head of private credit at Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 银行在重组截止日期前卸载 Colisee 债务
item.description: Colisee Group SAS 的一些银行贷款人正在以极高的折扣价出售其在这家资金短缺的护理院运营商中的风险敞口，因为该公司与其债务持有人之间的重组谈判已临近 8 月份的最后期限。【原文：Some bank lenders to Colisee Group SAS are offloading their exposure to the cash-strapped care home operator at steep discounts, as an August deadline looms over restructuring talks between the firm and its debt holders.】

item.title: 开发商敦促特朗普不要关闭价值 110 亿美元的中西部输电线路
item.description: 在密苏里州的一位美国参议员表示他已从联邦官员那里获得了停止该项目的承诺后，Invenergy 公司（一家紧密控股的电力开发商）呼吁特朗普政府确认其对美国中西部一条耗资 110 亿美元的输电线的承诺。【原文：Invenergy, a closely-held power developer, is calling on the Trump Administration to affirm its commitment to a $11 billion power line in the US Midwest after a US Senator from Missouri said he’s secured a pledge from federal officials to halt the project.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行称，加纳塞地可能在年底前跌至 1 美元兑 12 加纳塞地
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）表示，随着黄金出口收入趋于稳定、政府增加支出以及央行降低利率，加纳的塞地到今年年底可能会贬值到 1 美元兑 12 加元。【原文：Ghana’s cedi may depreciate to 12 per dollar by the end of the year as gold export revenue stabilizes, government increases spending and the central bank cuts interest rates, Barclays Plc said.】

item.title: 美国与印度就可能将关税降至 20% 以下的贸易协议进行谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国正在努力与印度达成一项临时贸易协议，可能会将印度提出的关税降至20%以下，从而使这个南亚国家在与该地区其他国家的竞争中处于有利地位。【原文：The US is working toward an interim trade deal with India that may reduce its proposed tariffs to below 20%, people familiar with the matter said, putting the South Asian nation in a favorable position against its peers in the region.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 Fortress 投资集团支持的佛罗里达 Brightline Trains 客运铁路公司计划推迟 7 月 15 日支付其 10% 和 12% 无评级免税债券的利息。【原文：Brightline Trains Florida, the Fortress Investment Group-backed passenger railroad, plans to defer a July 15 interest payment on its 10% and 12% unrated tax-exempt bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟接近为俄罗斯石油贸易制定新的价格上限制度
item.description: 欧盟向新的俄罗斯石油价格上限制度迈出了试探性的一步，该制度旨在进一步压低莫斯科的石油价格，并在未来继续施加压力。【原文：The European Union took a tentative step closer to a new price-cap regime on Russian oil that would aim to push the price of Moscow’s barrels down even further and keep the pressure on in the future.】

item.title: 力拓希望在特朗普关税下加大对美国铜业的投资
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划对进口关键金属铜征税后，该公司有投资美国铜矿的 "强烈愿望"。【原文：Rio Tinto Plc says it has a “strong desire” to invest in US copper mining following President Donald Trump’s plans to levy imports of the critical metal.】

item.title: 以太坊基金会在加密代币创始人身上找到现成买家
item.description: 以太坊基金会过去曾因其同名代币的公开市场销售而遭到批评者的反击，现在它似乎找到了一个现成的买家：最近成立的加密金库公司，由第二大加密货币的联合创始人之一领导。【原文：The Ethereum Foundation, which has faced a backlash from critics in the past for open-market sales of its namesake token, appears to have found a ready buyer: the recently formed crypto treasury firm headed by one of the co-creators of the second-biggest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 洛杉矶学校和郡政府将借贷更多资金用于支付数十亿虐待赔偿金
